text: Merav Michaeli (born 24 November 1966) is an Israeli feminist politician, the outgoing chairman of the Labor Party and Member of the Knesset on her behalf. Served as Minister of Transportation and Road Safety in the 36th government . Before her election to the Knesset, she was a television and radio host, a lecturer on communication and gender issues, and a publicist. == References == Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Feminists Category:Government ministers of Israel Category:HaAvoda politicians Category:Israeli journalists Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Tel Aviv University alumni
title: Merav Michaeli
